Title: Episode 7
Plot: A water-tight court case fails to put away a local gangster. Unable to cope with a guilty man walking free, DCI Hunt turns to alcohol but soon finds himself in a spot of bother. When it appears as though Hunt may have killed someone, it's up to Sam, torn between Gene and his replacement, a DCI who actually uses Sam's modern police techniques and vocabulary, to help him out.
GuestStars: Tony Marshall, Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Ralph Brown, Seamus O'Neill, Kieran O'Brien, Corrinne Wicks, Jason Watkins, Ian Hanmore, Johnny Leeze, Genevieve Walsh, Bernard Nagle
